projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover our influencer and media projects around the world.

bahrain.title: Bahrain
bahrain.description: An impressive media project introducing Bahrain's rich cultural heritage and modern life to the world.

sharm.title: Sharm El Sheikh
sharm.description: Unforgettable moments with the turquoise waters and colorful coral reefs of Egypt's pearl, Sharm El Sheikh.

hurghada.title: Hurghada
hurghada.description: An adventure exploring the unique beauty of the Red Sea and water sports paradise.

morocco.title: Morocco
morocco.description: A cultural journey experiencing Morocco's magical cities, desert, and rich cuisine.

jordan.title: Jordan
jordan.description: Jordan's treasures from the ancient beauty of Petra to the desert landscapes of Wadi Rum.

montenegro.title: Montenegro
montenegro.description: The magnificent bays and mountain views of Montenegro, the Adriatic's hidden paradise.

slides.title: Let AI run your social media. Track organic growth effortlessly.
slides.description: Your AI agents design, produce and optimise your channels while you focus on growth. Manage every social account from a single dashboard.

kpi.label: Conversion uplift
kpi.caption: Increase in qualified conversations and assisted sales completed overnight.

cases.title: In the Press
cases.description: We spotlight our clients’ success stories in the press to amplify brand value—delivering trusted, effective and innovative communication solutions.

cards.title: Turkish Actors in Egypt
cards.description: Turkish actors, captivated by Egypt’s history, culture and the Red Sea, invited everyone to live the same experience.

cards.title: Turkish Stars Take Over Bahrain
cards.description: Famous Turkish actors headlined a three-day series of events across Bahrain.

cards.title: Prontotour Celebrates 30 Years in Marrakech
cards.description: Trend-setting tour operator Prontotour kicked off its 30th anniversary celebrations in Morocco, giving celebrity guests a chance to explore Marrakech.

cards.title: Prontotour’s Early Booking Season Grows 70%
cards.description: Prontotour closed the first phase of early bookings with 70% growth and kicked off phase two with up to 50% domestic and 40% international savings.

cards.title: Leaders CXO 14th Gathering
cards.description: Hosted by LeadersCXO founder Cenk Dağcı and Join PR founder Ali Saçlı, the first 2022 gathering welcomed a select guest list including Prof. Dr. İlber Ortaylı and Prof. Dr. Uğur Batı.

cards.title: Prontotour Launches World Tour for Celebs & Creators
cards.description: Prontotour announced a year-long world tour program designed for prominent Turkish actors and influencers.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Enjoyed the Red Sea
cards.description: Beloved Turkish TV and film actors spent a getaway in Hurghada on the Red Sea—featuring Baran Bölükbaşı, Pelin Uluksar, Gizem Güneş, Damlasu İkizoğlu, Ahmet Kayakesen, Oral Özer and Berna Koraltürk.

cards.title: Desert Safari in Egypt
cards.description: Turkish stars Ayça Ayşin Turan, Salih Bademci, İmer Özgün, Erkan Kolçak Köstendil, Cansu Tosun, İlayda Ildır, İpek Filiz Yazıcı and Alican Okumuş explored Sharm El Sheikh, Egypt.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Gathered in Egypt’s Iconic Resort
cards.description: Leading Turkish actors spent four days in Sharm El Sheikh, the ‘Jewel of Egypt’ on the Sinai Peninsula, immersing themselves in its history, culture and the Red Sea.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Fell in Love with Jordan
cards.description: Beloved Turkish TV stars Gökçe Akyıldız, Mehmet Aykaç, Gizem Güneş and Emin Günenç were hosted in Jordan, praising its cultural heritage and the warm response to their shows.

cards.title: Turkish Actors Touched Down in Montenegro
cards.description: Hosted by Regent Porto Montenegro, Air Montenegro, Tivat Tourism Board and Porto Montenegro with Join PR, the trip featured stars Ali Yağcı, Mehmet Aykaç, Gökçe Akyıldız, Dilara Aksüyek, Emin Günenç and Join PR founder Ali Saçlı.

cards.title: Jordan Destination Showcase
cards.description: Turkish TV stars Gökçe Akyıldız, Mehmet Aykaç, Gizem Güneş and Emin Günenç were hosted in Jordan, praising its culture and the warm reception for their screen projects.

cards.title: Prontotour Opens 2024 Early Booking Season
cards.description: Holiday lovers are already planning 2024. Prontotour kicks off early booking with international, domestic and cruise packages that feel like ‘a trip for the price of a flight.’

clients.title: Brands that grow with us
clients.description: Global destinations, lifestyle icons, ambitious startups and legacy brands partnering with Join for integrated communication.

about.title: Who we are
about.subtitle: Join PR isn’t just an agency managing communication; it’s a new-generation partner turning brand stories into experiences.
about.description: Join PR brings together expertise across hospitality, aviation, tourism boards and lifestyle brands—combining deep travel knowledge with global experience. Built on a 360° model powered by strategy, creativity and data, we don’t just boost visibility—we manage perception.

seo.title: Join Social | Social Media Strategy & Community Management
seo.description: Join Social designs social strategies, content calendars, community management and optimization.

hero.title: Social ecosystems that grow brands and communities.
hero.subtitle: From strategy to community management, we orchestrate social storytelling with measurable impact.
hero.description: We build always-on social programs that integrate content, creators, paid media and data insight.

strategy.title: Content planning & publishing calendar
strategy.description: Campaign-aligned publishing cadences, platform-specific content sequencing and approval workflows.

planning.title: Trend-aligned short-form video and visual production
planning.description: Storyboards, shoots and agile post-production for Reels, TikTok and short-form visuals.

community.title: Community engagement and moderation
community.description: Responsive moderation for comments, DMs and UGC plus collaborative community activations.

reporting.title: Monthly reporting & content performance analysis
reporting.description: Monthly dashboards with content-level KPIs, insights and optimisation recommendations.

steps.title: Audit
steps.description: Current performance review, competitor mapping and opportunity scoring.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: Channel architecture, narrative territories and measurement framework.

steps.title: Execution
steps.description: Publishing, community activation and paid amplification.

steps.title: Optimization
steps.description: Insights, testing roadmaps and quarterly innovation sprints.

cta.title: Ready for next-gen social media management?
cta.description: Let’s build your social media ecosystem and create rapid wins.

media.title: Manage your brand’s digital world from one hub with Join Social
media.description: Join Social supercharges your social strategy with AI—automating everything from content production and trend tracking to visual language and reporting. Manage every platform from one secure, intelligent control center without sharing passwords or exposing vulnerabilities.
items: Post performance, trend content, competitor analysis and growth forecasts
Consistent visual and verbal communication language

seo.title: Join Ads | Performance Marketing & Digital Advertising
seo.description: Join Ads delivers cross-platform media planning, campaign optimisation and performance measurement.

hero.title: Digital Advertising Management and Performance Marketing
hero.subtitle: Integrated media strategies across Google, Meta and emerging platforms.
hero.description: We build measurable acquisition, conversion and retention programs aligned with your growth KPIs.

services.title: Google Ads Management
services.description: Algorithm-led optimisation and continuous performance improvements across search, display, video and discovery campaigns.

services.title: Meta Ads Management
services.description: Scalable results in the Meta ecosystem through creative variation testing, precise audience architecture and conversion-driven campaign builds.

services.title: Other Platforms
services.description: Multi-channel growth strategies spanning YouTube, TikTok, programmatic and high-impact media partnerships.

services.title: Performance Reporting & Optimisation
services.description: Advanced dashboards, attribution models and constant experimentation for agile decision-making and sustainable performance lifts.

items.title: Acquisition Cost (CPA)
items.description: Lowering acquisition costs through data-led optimisation, creative variation testing and AI-powered targeting.

items.title: Conversion Speed
items.description: Aligning the user journey with media strategy to accelerate the path from first interaction to purchase.

items.title: Lifetime Value (LTV)
items.description: Audience insight-led segmentation, retargeting and revenue-driving touchpoints to grow customer value long term.

cta.title: Plan your next campaign with Join x Ads.
cta.description: Let's strengthen your digital advertising strategy and create measurable results to achieve your growth goals.

seo.title: Join AI Lab | Web Development & AI-Powered Solutions
seo.description: Join AI Lab builds corporate websites, ecommerce automations, AI agents and data integrations.

hero.title: Design, code and artificial intelligence
hero.subtitle: From corporate platforms to AI automations, we architect future-ready experiences.
hero.description: We partner with brands to design, build and evolve web ecosystems powered by automation and AI.

services.title: Web Development UI/UX Design and Optimization
services.description: Corporate and dynamic websites engineered with performance and scalability in mind.

services.title: E-commerce automations
services.description: Workflow, merchandising and customer journey automations that drive growth.

services.title: AI agents & chatbots
services.description: Custom agent frameworks and conversational experiences with integrations.

services.title: Data automations & integrations
services.description: ETL pipelines, dashboards and data products stitched across teams.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We clarify business goals, user scenarios and areas where AI will add real value together.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: We architect end-to-end web/mobile experiences, user flows and AI interactions (chatbots, agents, recommendation systems, etc.).

steps.title: Build
steps.description: We code the application with modern tech stack, securely implementing LLM/API integrations and the data layer.

steps.title: Automation & Integration
steps.description: We build intelligent workflows running in the background with CRM, payment systems, third-party services and automation platforms (n8n, etc.).

steps.title: Optimize
steps.description: We continuously improve models, flows and interfaces by tracking usage data; we evolve the system by adding new AI scenarios.

mobile.title: Mobile Application Experiences
mobile.description: We bring your mobile applications to life with user-centered design and advanced technology. We deliver performant, secure and user-friendly solutions on iOS and Android platforms.

cta.title: Let's build your next digital product together.
cta.description: Share your brief and we'll architect a web or AI solution tailored to your vision.
